languages.text: Этот почтенный сервочереп сотворен из мощей пречистого брата Экласа, сурового истребителя ереси на мире Вечной Жатвы. Он сопутствовал многим ревностным полководцам веры, транслируя проповеди отмщения и праведной ненависти. Маглев-установка сервочерепа вышла из строя столетия назад, но ярость Императора по прежнему живет в динамиках его вокса.

This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.
languages.original_text: Этот почтенный сервочереп сотворен из мощей пречистого брата Экласа, сурового истребителя ереси на мире Вечной Жатвы. Он сопутствовал многим ревностным полководцам веры, транслируя проповеди отмщения и праведной ненависти. Маглев-установка сервочерепа вышла из строя столетия назад, но ярость Императора по прежнему живет в динамиках его вокса.

traits.locale_text: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hallows of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still alive in its vox loudspeakers.

It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. languages.text: Este venerable servocráneo fue creado a partir de las reliquias del exaltado hermano Eclas, un flagelo incansable de la herejía en el mundo de Cosechaeterna. Ha acompañado a más de un comandante fervoroso, proclamando sermones de venganza y de justo odio. La unidad de levitación magnética del servocráneo lleva siglos averiada, pero la furia del Emperador aún resuena en los altavoces de sus vocos.
languages.original_text: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.

traits.locale_text: Este venerable servocráneo fue creado a partir de las reliquias del exaltado hermano Eclas, un flagelo incansable de la herejía en el mundo de Cosechaeterna. Ha acompañado a más de un comandante fervoroso, proclamando sermones de venganza y de justo odio. La unidad de levitación magnética del servocráneo lleva siglos averiada, pero la furia del Emperador aún resuena en los altavoces de sus vocos.

languages.text: Ce vénérable servocrâne a été fabriqué à partir des reliques sacrées du très noble frère Eclas, un implacable combattant de l'hérésie sur le monde d'Outremoisson. Il a accompagné au combat plus d'un commandant zélé, proférant des sermons de vengeance céleste et de haine vertueuse. L'unité à sustentation magnétique du servocrâne est en panne depuis des siècles, mais la colère de l'Empereur s'exprime plus intensément que jamais à travers ses diffuseurs-vox.
languages.original_text: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.

traits.locale_text: Ce vénérable servocrâne a été fabriqué à partir des reliques sacrées du très noble frère Eclas, un implacable combattant de l'hérésie sur le monde d'Outremoisson. Il a accompagné au combat plus d'un commandant zélé, proférant des sermons de vengeance céleste et de haine vertueuse. L'unité à sustentation magnétique du servocrâne est en panne depuis des siècles, mais la colère de l'Empereur s'exprime plus intensément que jamais à travers ses diffuseurs-vox.

languages.text: 这枚令人敬畏的伺服头骨，是用艾克拉斯兄弟的头骨制成的。这位无比崇高的兄弟生前曾剿灭了盘踞在丰饶世界中的异形。这枚伺服头骨曾陪伴许多虔诚而狂热的指挥官踏上战场，滔滔不绝地播放着关于复仇与义愤的布道。它的磁悬浮装置早在数百年前便已失效，但音阵广播中仍然回荡着帝皇掷地有声的义愤之语。
languages.original_text: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.

traits.locale_text: 这枚令人敬畏的伺服头骨，是用艾克拉斯兄弟的头骨制成的。这位无比崇高的兄弟生前曾剿灭了盘踞在丰饶世界中的异形。这枚伺服头骨曾陪伴许多虔诚而狂热的指挥官踏上战场，滔滔不绝地播放着关于复仇与义愤的布道。它的磁悬浮装置早在数百年前便已失效，但音阵广播中仍然回荡着帝皇掷地有声的义愤之语。

languages.text: この由緒正しきサーヴォスカルは、エバーハーベストの惑星で異端を容赦なく打ち破ったブラザー・エクラスの遺体をくりぬいて作られたものだ。それは数多くの信仰に熱意を捧げる戦争司令官に随行し、復讐と正義の憎悪を説いてきた。サーヴォスカルの磁気浮上装置は何世紀も故障したままだが、そのヴォクス端末には皇帝の怒りがまだ息づいている。
languages.original_text: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.

traits.locale_text: この由緒正しきサーヴォスカルは、エバーハーベストの惑星で異端を容赦なく打ち破ったブラザー・エクラスの遺体をくりぬいて作られたものだ。それは数多くの信仰に熱意を捧げる戦争司令官に随行し、復讐と正義の憎悪を説いてきた。サーヴォスカルの磁気浮上装置は何世紀も故障したままだが、そのヴォクス端末には皇帝の怒りがまだ息づいている。

languages.text: Dieser ehrwürdige Servoschädel wurde aus den ausgehölten Reliquien des erhabenen Bruders Eclas gefertigt, einem unerbittlichen Kämpfer gegen die Ketzerei auf der Welt Everharvest. Er hat schon viele fanatische Kriegskommandanten des Glaubens begleitet und dabei Vergeltung und rechtschaffenen Hass gepredigt. Die Maglev-Einheit des Servoschädels ist seit Jahrhunderten defekt, doch der Wut des Imperators lebt noch immer in seinen Vox-Lautsprechern.
languages.original_text: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.

traits.locale_text: Dieser ehrwürdige Servoschädel wurde aus den ausgehölten Reliquien des erhabenen Bruders Eclas gefertigt, einem unerbittlichen Kämpfer gegen die Ketzerei auf der Welt Everharvest. Er hat schon viele fanatische Kriegskommandanten des Glaubens begleitet und dabei Vergeltung und rechtschaffenen Hass gepredigt. Die Maglev-Einheit des Servoschädels ist seit Jahrhunderten defekt, doch der Wut des Imperators lebt noch immer in seinen Vox-Lautsprechern.
